title: Mayne Island Skeletons
description: Magda's friend Brent has been accused of a crime and has gone into hiding. Precious First Nations artifacts have disappeared. The children on Mayne Island are alarmed by tales of ghosts and skeletons and a haunted house. Will Magda uncover the truth behind the stories, clear up the mystery of the lost treasure and help return Brent to his friends?
author: Amber Harvey
